00001 #ifndef WORKSPACE_H
00002 #define WORKSPACE_H
00003 
00004 #include "main.h"
00005 #include "pgrid.h"
00006 #include "editor.h"
00007 #include "texture.h"
00008 
00009 class t_workspace: public input_handler
00010 {
00011     private:
00012         float zoom;
00013         vec img;        // bild-offset
00014         bool dragging;
00015         u32 dragstart;
00016         vec dragstartpos;
00017         static t_texture *bgtexture;
00018         
00019     public:
00020         class t_pgrid *pgrid;
00021         class t_image *image;
00022     
00023         t_workspace(t_pgrid *_pgrid): pgrid(_pgrid), zoom(1.0), dragging(false)
00024         {
00025             image= new t_image(this);
00026             centerimage();
00027             
00028             if(!bgtexture)
00029             {
00030                 //~ #define tsize 32
00031                 
00032                 //~ u8 bgtex[tsize*tsize];
00033                 //~ mkblobu8(bgtex, tsize, 0.5);
00034                 //~ bgtexture= new t_texture(tsize, tsize, 8, bgtex, true);
00035                 
00036                 //~ #undef tsize
00037                 
00038                 #define tsize 16
00039                 u8 bgtex[tsize*tsize];
00040                 memset(bgtex, 16, tsize*tsize);
00041                 for(int i= 0; i<tsize; i++)
00042                 {
00043                     if(!(i&1)) bgtex[i]+= 32,
00044                                bgtex[i*tsize]+= 32,
00045                                bgtex[i*tsize+tsize/2]+= 16,
00046                                bgtex[i+tsize/2*tsize]+= 16;
00047                 }
00048                 bgtexture= new t_texture(tsize, tsize, 8, bgtex, true);
00049                 #undef tsize
00050             }
00051         }
00052         
00053         ~t_workspace()
00054         {
00055             delete image;
00056         }
00057         
00058         float getzoom() { return zoom; }
00059         
00060         vec screen2img(int x, int y)
00061         {
00062             vec ret((x-img.x)/zoom, (y-img.y)/zoom);
00063             return ret;
00064         }
00065         
00066         vec img2screen(float x, float y)
00067         {
00068             vec ret(img.x+(x/zoom), img.y+(y/zoom));
00069             return ret;
00070         }
00071         
00072         void centerimage()
00073         {
00074             float w= image->width*zoom,
00075                   h= image->height*zoom;
00076             img.x= (pgrid->screen.width-w)/2;
00077             img.y= (pgrid->screen.height-h)/2;
00078         }
00079         
00080         void renderbg()
00081         {
00082             bgtexture->bind();
00083             glColor3f(1, 1, 1);
00084             glDepthMask(false);
00085             glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00086             glMatrixMode(GL_TEXTURE);
00087             glLoadIdentity();
00088             glScalef(1.0/zoom, 1.0/zoom, 1);
00089             double x= -floor(img.x)/bgtexture->width, y= -floor(img.y)/bgtexture->height,
00090                    w= float(pgrid->screen.width)/bgtexture->width,
00091                    h= float(pgrid->screen.height)/bgtexture->height;
00092             glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00093             glTexCoord2f(x+0, y+0);     glVertex2f(0, 0);
00094             glTexCoord2f(x+w, y+0);     glVertex2f(pgrid->screen.width, 0);
00095             glTexCoord2f(x+w, y+h);     glVertex2f(pgrid->screen.width, pgrid->screen.height);
00096             glTexCoord2f(x+0, y+h);     glVertex2f(0, pgrid->screen.height);
00097             glEnd();
00098             glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00099             glDepthMask(true);
00100         }
00101         
00102         void render()
00103         {
00104             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00105             glLoadIdentity();
00106             if(!pgrid->screen.ortho)
00107             {
00108                 glScalef(1, -1, 1);
00109                 glTranslatef(-pgrid->screen.width/2, -pgrid->screen.height/2, -pgrid->screen.planedist);
00110             }
00111             
00112             glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00113             glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00114             
00115             renderbg();
00116             
00117             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00118             glPushMatrix();
00119             glTranslatef(img.x, img.y, 0);
00120             glScalef(zoom, zoom, 100.0f*zoom); //zoom*pgrid->screen.planedist*0.25);
00121             image->render(0,0, image->width,image->height);
00122             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00123             glPopMatrix();
00124         }
00125         
00126         void setcenter(float img_cx, float img_cy)
00127         {
00128             img.x= pgrid->screen.width/2 - img_cx*zoom;
00129             img.y= pgrid->screen.height/2 - img_cy*zoom;
00130         }
00131         
00132         void dozoom(float factor, bool mousecenter= false)
00133         {
00134             if( (zoom>64 && factor>1.0) || (zoom<1.0/64 && factor<1.0)) return;
00135             vec focus= mousecenter? screen2img(int(pgrid->mouse.x), int(pgrid->mouse.y)):
00136                        screen2img(pgrid->screen.width/2, pgrid->screen.height/2);
00137 
00138             zoom*= factor;
00139             setcenter(focus.x, focus.y);
00140             
00141             if(zoom<1.0) printf("zoom: 1:%.0f\n", 1.0/zoom);
00142             else printf("zoom: %.0f:1\n", zoom);
00143         }
00144         
00145         void printstatus()
00146         {
00147             t_layer *l= image->current_layer();
00148             printf("grid size: %dx%d\nparticles: %d\n", l->grid->width, l->grid->height, l->particles->particles.size());
00149         }
00150         
00151         void keyboard_event(SDL_KeyboardEvent &event)
00152         {
00153             int step= pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_LSHIFT)||pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_RSHIFT)? 16: 
00154                       pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_LCTRL)||pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_RCTRL)? 4: 
00155                       8;
00156             if(event.state==SDL_PRESSED) switch(event.keysym.sym)
00157             {
00158                 case SDLK_RIGHT:        img.x-= step; break;
00159                 case SDLK_LEFT:         img.x+= step; break;
00160                 case SDLK_DOWN:         img.y-= step; break;
00161                 case SDLK_UP:           img.y+= step; break;
00162                 case SDLK_KP_PLUS:
00163                 case SDLK_PLUS:         dozoom(2.0); break;
00164                 case SDLK_KP_MINUS:
00165                 case SDLK_MINUS:        dozoom(0.5); break;
00166                 case 'c':               centerimage(); break;
00167                 case 'f':               pgrid->screen.togglefullscreen(); centerimage(); break;
00168                 case 'o':               if(pgrid->screen.ortho) pgrid->screen.setperspective(); else pgrid->screen.setortho(); break;
00169                 case 'g':               image->showgrid^= 1, printf("grid display %s\n", image->showgrid? "on": "off"); break;
00170                 case '^':               printstatus(); break;
00171             }
00172         }
00173         
00174         void mouse_motion_event(SDL_MouseMotionEvent &event)
00175         {
00176             if(dragging)
00177             {
00178                 vec p(event.xrel, event.yrel);
00179                 img.add(p);
00180             }
00181         }
00182 
00183         void mouse_button_event(SDL_MouseButtonEvent &evt)
00184         {
00185             if(evt.type==SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN) switch(evt.button)
00186             {
00187                 case SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE:
00188                     dragging= true;
00189                     dragstart= pgrid->time();
00190                     dragstartpos= pgrid->mouse;
00191                     break;
00192                 case SDL_BUTTON_WHEELUP:
00193                     dozoom(2.0, pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_LSHIFT)||pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_RSHIFT)? true: false);
00194                     break;
00195                 case SDL_BUTTON_WHEELDOWN:
00196                     dozoom(0.5, pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_LSHIFT)||pgrid->getkeystate(SDLK_RSHIFT)? true: false);
00197                     break;
00198             }
00199             else if(evt.button==SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE)
00200             {
00201                 if(dragging && pgrid->time()-dragstart<250)
00202                 {
00203                     vec d(dragstartpos); d.sub(pgrid->mouse);
00204                     if(d.len()<3.0)
00205                     {
00206                         vec v= screen2img(evt.x, evt.y);
00207                         setcenter(v.x, v.y);
00208                     }
00209                 }
00210                 dragging= false;
00211             }
00212         }
00213 };

00215 
00216 #endif
